entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
